Locale.Value:
Major Update: New Kanban View

- Enjoy a more intuitive interface and user-friendly experience with our redesigned Kanban View.
"Today", "Next 7 Days" and other Smart Lists to categorize and manage tasks better.

How to use: Tap "More - Kanban View" to switch on any list.

【重磅更新】全新看板视图
- 看板视图设计全新升级，界面更简洁，操作更方便。
- 支持在“今天”、“最近 7 天”等智能清单中使用看板视图，更好地分类管理任务。
打开方式：在任意清单的右上角，选择“更多 - 看板视图”即可。
